long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Yelp Reviews Extractor: Unlock Valuable Customer Insights with Ease

Gain a comprehensive understanding of your customer's experiences with our powerful Yelp Reviews Exporter browser extension. Effortlessly download business reviews from Yelp.com with a single click, eliminating the need for manual data collection or privacy concerns associated with server storage.

Our user-friendly tool simplifies scraping customer reviews, requiring no coding expertise. Simply open any Yelp business page, click "Download Reviews," and export the structured data file in CSV, JSON, or XLSX (Excel) format from the popup window.

AI Review Summary 
Unlock deeper insights with our ChatGPT-Powered Review Analysis feature. Generate a detailed analysis, including advantages, disadvantages, improvement suggestions, and a recommendation on whether to buy or not, based on the extracted reviews.

After export, you can gain access to essential reviewer data, such as ratings, comments, helpfulness votes, and user information (name, location, photos, etc.), enabling data-driven decision-making.

Choose between CSV, JSON, or Excel formats to analyze and share customer feedback seamlessly. Our extension eliminates the need for complex coding or data scraping, empowering you with valuable insights in seconds.

E-commerce managers, analysts, and developers rely on our extension to identify customer feedback trends, monitor competitor activity, uncover business opportunities, and enhance the overall customer experience.

Data Privacy
Your customer data is 100% secure, as it never leaves your local machine. We prioritize user privacy by eliminating any user data transmission to our servers.

Disclaimer
This extension is an independently developed product by ExtensionsBox and has no association with Yelp Inc.
